drive.label: Drive
drive.value: Prove his theories about zero-point energy and government conspiracies,Expose those who suppressed his research and ruined his reputation,Force the world to acknowledge his genius, no matter the cost,Protect his Zero Suit technology at all costs—it's his life's work

abilities.label: Abilities
abilities.value:
• Zero Suit provides life support and enhances physical capabilities
  • Zero-point energy blasts capable of disrupting matter
  • Limited flight via gravitic manipulation
  • Force fields that nullify incoming attacks
  • Power-draining field that weakens superhuman abilities
  • Telekinesis for manipulating objects at a distance

biography.label: Notes
biography.value: Dr. Ellroy Newman was once a brilliant researcher at Halcyon City's premier energy institute, on the verge of breakthroughs that could have revolutionized power generation worldwide. His fate changed when he was exposed to exotic radiation during an experiment—an incident he later claimed was sabotage. As his body failed and his mind unraveled, Newman became convinced of vast conspiracies working to suppress his discoveries. In secret, he built the Zero Suit, a life-support system that also harnesses zero-point energy. Now operating as Zero, he steals equipment, attacks government facilities, and battles heroes in his crusade to expose the truth. His theories grow more elaborate with each passing day, and his once-noble goals have twisted into something darker—he'll tear the city apart if that's what it takes to be proven right.

system.description: When Zero focuses his zero-point energy, the air hums with eerie silence as your powers flicker and fail. He smirks behind his visor, knowing he's stripped you of your greatest strength. If you don't act fast, he'll @UUID[Compendium.masks-newgeneration-unofficial.documents.JournalEntry.llXD7GIZiU5z5MiG.JournalEntryPage.EgNc30M2opeJiQOg]{turn your move back on you}, using your own abilities against you in a devastating reversal. The Zero Suit's energy-draining field makes every movement feel sluggish, like wading through molasses.

Zero's monitors flicker with stolen data, revealing incriminating footage of your mentors or allies in compromising situations. "See?" he screeches, "They've been lying to you all along!" The evidence seems damning, forcing you to question who you can trust. If ignored, he'll @UUID[Compendium.masks-newgeneration-unofficial.documents.JournalEntry.llXD7GIZiU5z5MiG.JournalEntryPage.NQfxjpOmX5mqu1Ow]{take Influence} you, twisting your perception of the people you rely on. His paranoia is contagious, and the seeds of doubt take root.

The air shimmers as Zero taps into the fundamental forces binding reality itself. Buildings tremble, glass shatters, and the ground beneath you starts to fracture into floating debris. He's creating a localized singularity, and if you don't stop him, he'll @UUID[Compendium.masks-newgeneration-unofficial.documents.JournalEntry.llXD7GIZiU5z5MiG.JournalEntryPage.J6NDHhQ2xeaHUZ6Y]{put innocents in danger} as the entire block gets sucked into his unstable vortex. His eyes glow with manic energy—he's willing to tear apart the city to prove his theories correct.

Zero's voice echoes inside your skull, a psychic broadcast of his fractured mind. "You're just pawns in their game!" he screams, flooding your thoughts with fragmented visions of shadowy figures pulling strings. The mental assault leaves you disoriented, and if you don't shake it off, he'll @UUID[Compendium.masks-newgeneration-unofficial.documents.JournalEntry.llXD7GIZiU5z5MiG.JournalEntryPage.aiXzW3H0z4NREaFc]{inflict a Condition} that mirrors his own paranoia. His madness is a contagion, and you're starting to see enemies everywhere.

Cornered and desperate, Zero activates a emergency teleportation module in his suit. "This isn't over!" he snarls as reality bends around him. Before he vanishes, he @UUID[Compendium.masks-newgeneration-unofficial.documents.JournalEntry.llXD7GIZiU5z5MiG.JournalEntryPage.Rm4fQyfiwGkpytfF]{reveals the future}, showing you a glimpse of his next target—a facility or person he claims holds the key to the conspiracy. The vision is cryptic, but the urgency is clear. He's always one step ahead, and now he's slipped away again.

Zero's paranoia spikes, and he sees traitors in every shadow. He barks orders at imaginary allies, his voice cracking with panic. Suddenly, he turns on you, screaming "You're one of THEM!" as he @UUID[Compendium.masks-newgeneration-unofficial.documents.JournalEntry.w5RMQhyRMu0Kz8Bh.JournalEntryPage.7bUuUXo8ob2I9rx3]{lashes out verbally}, hurling accusations and half-baked conspiracy theories. His fear makes him reckless, and he's liable to trigger a self-destruct sequence or unleash an untested weapon in his desperation to escape.

Zero's visor flares crimson as his rage overrides his suit's safety protocols. "You'll regret crossing me!" he roars, releasing a shockwave of uncontrolled zero-point energy. The blast @UUID[Compendium.masks-newgeneration-unofficial.documents.JournalEntry.llXD7GIZiU5z5MiG.JournalEntryPage.y38zWkHIGzqyZmGc]{inflicts collateral damage}, shearing the facades off buildings and hurling cars like toys. His anger makes him powerful but sloppy—he's not even trying to aim anymore, and the entire battlefield is in the line of fire.

For a fleeting moment, Zero's manic energy falters. "What...what have I done?" he mutters, staring at his shaking hands. He looks at you with sudden, desperate clarity, @UUID[Compendium.masks-newgeneration-unofficial.documents.JournalEntry.llXD7GIZiU5z5MiG.JournalEntryPage.TxVR9tX5Y50wmTRt]{telling you the possible consequences—and asking} if his theories could possibly justify the destruction he's caused. This rare moment of lucidity won't last—he's either on the verge of surrender or about to double down to silence his guilt.

Zero slumps, his suit's energy field flickering weakly. "None of it matters...they've already won," he whispers. The area around him grows darker as his despair manifests physically, @UUID[Compendium.masks-newgeneration-unofficial.documents.JournalEntry.llXD7GIZiU5z5MiG.JournalEntryPage.NXgUwNBxnjOEIqRa]{activating the downsides of your abilities} as hope itself seems to leach away. Your powers feel muted, your resolve wavers—his hopelessness is a black hole, and it's pulling everyone in.

"You think I'm crazy? I'll SHOW you!" Zero snarls, his voice cracking with desperation. He starts frantically recalibrating his suit, @UUID[Compendium.masks-newgeneration-unofficial.documents.JournalEntry.llXD7GIZiU5z5MiG.JournalEntryPage.89UPbdTtpbs4kmP3]{making you pay a price for victory} as he risks a catastrophic overload to demonstrate his theories. The air crackles with unstable energy—he'd rather die than be dismissed again, and he's taking the whole block with him if that's what it takes to be proven right.
@UUID[Compendium.masks-newgeneration-unofficial.documents.JournalEntry.llXD7GIZiU5z5MiG.JournalEntryPage.voNk2PNNF7oNqnSn]{Make a Playbook Move}
